name: RevokeApiToken
description:
Revoke an API token to prevent its use.

Use this tool to revoke a Ramp API token, ensuring it can no longer be utilized for authentication.

parameters.name: token_to_revoke
parameters.description: The access or refresh token that needs to be revoked.

value_schema.description: Access token or refresh token to be revoked.

parameters.name: token_type
parameters.description: Specify whether the token to be revoked is an 'access_token' or 'refresh_token'.

value_schema.description: Type of the token to be revoked.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the ramp API.

parameters.name: token
parameters.description: Access token or refresh token to be revoked.

value_schema.description: Access token or refresh token to be revoked.

parameters.name: token_type_hint
parameters.description: Type of the token to be revoked.

value_schema.description: Type of the token to be revoked.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
